html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05282023-06-01GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Arrangement between the Government of Canada and the European Space Agency concerning the Participation by the Government of Canada in the Space Safety Programme
PrecisOrder authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ARRANGEMENT BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA AND THE EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCY CONCERNING THE PARTICIPATION BY THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA IN THE SPACE SAFETY PROGRAMME, done at Paris on 13 June 2019; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Arrangement between the Government of Canada and the European Space Agency concerning the Participation by the Government of Canada in the Space Safety Programme
precis: Order authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ARRANGEMENT BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA AND THE EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCY CONCERNING THE PARTICIPATION BY THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA IN THE SPACE SAFETY PROGRAMME, done at Paris on 13 June 2019; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement.
